member.name: T:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo
member.summary: Archived file info

member.name: F:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.SHA1
member.summary: SHA-1

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.Dataset
member.summary: Dataset name for this file
member.remarks: Will be blank for data package files

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.DataPackageID
member.summary: Data Package ID for this file
member.remarks: A file should only have a non-zero DatasetID or a non-zero DataPackageID, not both

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.DatasetID
member.summary: Dataset ID for this file
member.remarks: A file should only have a non-zero DatasetID or a non-zero DataPackageID, not both

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.DatasetYearQuarter
member.summary: Dataset year-quarter string, for example 2013_3
member.remarks: Will be blank for data package files

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.Filename
member.summary: Filename

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.FileID
member.summary: MyEMSL File ID

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.FileCreationTime
member.summary: Original file creation time (on the host system prior to MyEMSL ingest)
member.remarks: Use UpdateSourceFileTimes to update this value

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.FileLastWriteTime
member.summary: Last modification time (on the host system prior to MyEMSL ingest)
member.remarks: Use UpdateSourceFileTimes to update this value

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.FileSizeBytes
member.summary: File size, in bytes

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.Hash
member.summary: SHA-1 or MD5 hash
member.remarks: Typically a SHA-1 hash

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.HashType
member.summary: This will typically be sha1, but could be md5

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.Instrument
member.summary: Instrument name for this file
member.remarks: Will be blank for data package files

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.PathWithDataset
member.summary: Relative path to the file, including the dataset name
member.remarks: Uses Windows-style slashes

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.PathWithDatasetUnix
member.summary: Relative path to the file, including the dataset name
member.remarks: Uses Unix-style slashes

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.PathWithInstrumentAndDatasetUnix
member.summary: Relative path to the file, including the instrument, year_quarter, and dataset
member.remarks: Uses Unix-style slashes

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.PathWithInstrumentAndDatasetWindows
member.summary: Relative path to the file, including the instrument, year_quarter, and dataset
member.remarks: Uses Windows-style slashes. Note that instrument IMS_TOF_4 was renamed to IMS04_AgTOF05 in 2013, and thus there are datasets with files associated with both instruments in MyEMSL

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.RelativePathUnix
member.summary: Path to the file, relative to the dataset directory
member.remarks: Uses Unix-style slashes

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.RelativePathWindows
member.summary: Path to the file, relative to the dataset directory
member.remarks: Uses Windows-style slashes

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.Sha1Hash
member.summary: SHA-1 hash, provided HashType is "sha1" or empty

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.SubDirPath
member.summary: SubDirectory path of the file, as reported by MyEMSL This path will have Linux-style slashes ('/') if there are subdirectories
member.remarks: The SubDirPath for Data package files will always start with the data package directory name

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.SubmissionTime
member.summary: UTC time that the file was submitted (as a string)

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.SubmissionTimeValue
member.summary: UTC time that the file was submitted

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.SubmissionTimeODBC
member.summary: Submission time in ODBC 24 hour format

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.SubmissionTimeODBC12hr
member.summary: Submission time in ODBC 12 hour format

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo.TransactionID
member.summary: MyEMSL transaction ID for this specific file
member.remarks: Incremented for every newly uploaded bundle (.tar file), and thus a good substitute for dates when comparing two files to see which is newer

member.name: M:MyEMSLReader.DataPackageListInfo.FindFiles(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Looks for the given file, returning any matches as a list (searches this directory and subdirectories)
member.remarks: subdirectoryName can contain a partial path, for example 2013_09_10_DPB_Unwashed_Media_25um.d\2013_09_10_In_1sec_1MW.m
member.param: File name to find; can contain a wildcard, e.g. *.zip
Subdirectory in which the file must reside; can contain a wildcard, e.g. SIC*
Data Package ID filter

member.name: M:MyEMSLReader.DataPackageListInfo.FindFiles(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Looks for the given file, returning any matches as a list (searches this directory and subdirectories)
member.remarks: subdirectoryName can contain a partial path, for example 2013_09_10_DPB_Unwashed_Media_25um.d\2013_09_10_In_1sec_1MW.m
member.param: File name to find; can contain a wildcard, e.g. *.zip
Subdirectory in which the file must reside; can contain a wildcard, e.g. SIC*
Data Package ID filter
Comma separated list of MyEMSL File IDs to filter on (blank to ignore); must be one of the files associated with the given data package

member.name: M:MyEMSLReader.DataPackageListInfo.FindFiles(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Looks for the given file, returning any matches as a list
member.remarks: subdirectoryName can contain a partial path, for example 2013_09_10_DPB_Unwashed_Media_25um.d\2013_09_10_In_1sec_1MW.m
member.param: File name to find; can contain a wildcard, e.g. *.zip
Subdirectory in which the file must reside; can contain a wildcard, e.g. SIC*
Data Package ID filter
Comma separated list of MyEMSL File IDs to filter on (blank to ignore); must be one of the files associated with the given data package
True to search all subdirectories; false to only search the root directory (or only subdirectoryName)
Set to True if fileName contains a list of file names (or file specs) separated by a semicolon

member.name: M:MyEMSLReader.DataPackageListInfo.RefreshInfo
member.summary: Contact the metadata server to find the files associated with the data packages added via AddDataPackage
member.returns: True if successful, false if an error

members.member:
List of error messages
The messages are cleared by when these functions are called: ProcessDownloadQueue and RefreshInfo ReSharper disable once UnusedMember.Global

MyEMSL IDs of files queued to be downloaded
Keys are MyEMSL File IDs, values are struct FileDownloadInfo ReSharper disable once UnusedMember.Global

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.DatasetInfoBase.IncludeAllRevisions
member.summary: When True, include all revisions of files that were imported to MyEMSL multiple times When False, only reports the newest version of a file
member.remarks: Default is False

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.DatasetInfoBase.ThrowErrors
member.summary: When true, raise a DebugEvent prior to contacting the metadata server

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.DatasetInfoBase.ReportMetadataURLs
member.summary: When true, raise a DebugEvent prior to contacting the metadata server

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.DatasetInfoBase.TraceMode
member.summary: When true, use Debug Events to show additional information

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.DatasetInfoBase.UseTestInstance
member.summary: When False use https://my.emsl.pnl.gov/myemsl/elasticsearch/simple_items When True use https://test0.my.emsl.pnl.gov/myemsl/search/simple/index.shtml

member.summary: Base dataset info

member.param: Archive File Info

member.summary: Queue a file to be downloaded
member.param: Archive File Info
True if the file will need to be unzipped after the download (this DLL will not unzip the file; it will simply include this in event FileDownloadedEventArgs)

member.name: M:MyEMSLReader.DatasetInfoBase.AddFileToDownloadQueue(System.Int64,MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Queue a file to be downloaded
member.remarks: fileInfo can be null if unzipRequired is false
member.param: MyEMSL File ID
Archive File Info
True if the file will need to be unzipped after the download (this DLL will not unzip the file; it will simply include this in event FileDownloadedEventArgs)

members.member:
Queue a file to be downloaded
fileInfo can be null if unzipRequired is false ReSharper disable once UnusedMember.Global MyEMSL File ID Archive File Info True if the file will need to be unzipped after the download (this DLL will not unzip the file; it will simply include this in event FileDownloadedEventArgs) Explicit destination file path

Appends the MyEMSL File ID tag to a given file path
Path to which the MyEMSL FileID should be appended MyEMSL File ID New path, for example QC_Shew_13-04_pt1_1_1_31Jul13_Cheetah_13-07-01.raw@MyEMSLID_84327 ReSharper disable once UnusedMember.Global

Verify that svc-dms.pfx exists either in the same directory as Pacifica.core.dll, C:\DMS_Programs\client_certs, or at C:\client_certs\
Output: error message, indicating the paths that were checked True if the file is found, otherwise false ReSharper disable once UnusedMember.Global

member.name: M:MyEMSLReader.DatasetInfoBase.ClearDownloadQueue
member.summary: Clear the download queue

members.member:
Parses a path that contains the MyEMSL FileID tag
Path to parse, for example QC_Shew_13-04_pt1_1_1_31Jul13_Cheetah_13-07-01.raw@MyEMSLID_84327 MyEMSL File ID if successfully parsed, 0 if not present or a problem ReSharper disable once UnusedMember.Global

member.name: M:MyEMSLReader.DatasetInfoBase.ExtractMyEMSLFileID(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Parses a path that contains the MyEMSL FileID tag
member.param: Path to parse, for example QC_Shew_13-04_pt1_1_1_31Jul13_Cheetah_13-07-01.raw@MyEMSLID_84327
Path with the MyEMSL FileID tag removed, for example QC_Shew_13-04_pt1_1_1_31Jul13_Cheetah_13-07-01.raw
member.returns: MyEMSL File ID if successfully parsed, 0 if not present or a problem

Subdirectory in which the file must reside; can contain a wildcard, e.g. SIC*

member.name: M:MyEMSLReader.DatasetInfoBase.FindFiles(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Looks for the given file, returning any matches as a list
member.remarks: subdirectoryName can contain a partial path, for example 2013_09_10_DPB_Unwashed_Media_25um.d\2013_09_10_In_1sec_1MW.m
member.param: File name to find; can contain a wildcard, e.g. *.zip Separate multiple values using a vertical bar, e.g. analysis.baf|ser
Subdirectory in which the file must reside; can contain a wildcard, e.g. SIC*
Dataset name filter
Comma separated list of MyEMSL File IDs to filter on (blank to ignore); must be one of the files associated with the given dataset
True to search all subdirectories; false to only search the root directory (or only subdirectoryName)
Set to True if fileName contains a list of file names (or file specs) separated by a semicolon

member.name: M:MyEMSLReader.DatasetInfoBase.FindFiles(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Looks for the given file (supporting wildcards) or list of File IDs
member.remarks: subdirectoryName can contain a partial path, for example 2013_09_10_DPB_Unwashed_Media_25um.d\2013_09_10_In_1sec_1MW.m
member.param: File name to find; can contain a wildcard, e.g. *.zip Separate multiple values using a vertical bar, e.g. analysis.baf|ser
Subdirectory in which the file must reside; can contain a wildcard, e.g. SIC*
Dataset name filter (blank to ignore)
Data package ID filter (0 to ignore)
Comma separated list of MyEMSL File IDs to filter on (blank to ignore); must be one of the files associated with the given dataset or data package
True to search all subdirectories; false to only search the root directory (or only subdirectoryName)
Set to True if fileName contains a list of file names (or file specs) separated by a semicolon

members.member:
Looks for the given directory, returning any matches as a list
Directory name to find; can contain a wildcard, e.g. SIC* List of matching directories ReSharper disable once UnusedMember.Global

member.name: T:MyEMSLReader.Downloader
member.summary: This class contacts MyEMSL to download the desired files, which must be specified by MyEMSL File ID values Use the Reader class to find files and determine File IDs
member.remarks: Written by Matthew Monroe for PNNL in August 2013

member.name: T:MyEMSLReader.Downloader.DownloadLayout
member.summary: Download layout

member.name: F:MyEMSLReader.Downloader.DownloadLayout.FlatNoSubdirectories
member.summary: Flat, no subdirectories

member.name: F:MyEMSLReader.Downloader.DownloadLayout.SingleDataset
member.summary: Single dataset

member.name: F:MyEMSLReader.Downloader.DownloadLayout.DatasetNameAndSubdirectories
member.summary: Separate datasets, each in their own subdirectory

member.name: F:MyEMSLReader.Downloader.DownloadLayout.InstrumentYearQuarterDataset
member.summary: Separate datasets, arranged by Year_Quarter\DatasetName

member.name: T:MyEMSLReader.Downloader.Overwrite
member.summary: File overwrite behavior

member.name: F:MyEMSLReader.Downloader.Overwrite.IfChanged
member.summary: Only overwrite if the downloaded file is different
member.remarks: This mode will compute a SHA-1 hash of the target file and only overwrite the target if the hash values differ

member.name: F:MyEMSLReader.Downloader.Overwrite.Always
member.summary: Always overwrite

member.name: F:MyEMSLReader.Downloader.Overwrite.Never
member.summary: Never overwrite

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.Downloader.DownloadedFiles
member.summary: The most recently downloaded files. Keys are the full path to the downloaded file; values are extended file info

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.Downloader.IncludeAllRevisions
member.summary: When True, if downloading multiple versions of the same file, include the FileID in the filename When False, if downloading multiple versions of the same file, will only keep one of the versions (order is not defined)
member.remarks: Default is False

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.Downloader.OverwriteMode
member.summary: Overwrite mode (IfChanged, Always, or Never)
member.remarks: Default is IfChanged

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.Downloader.PercentComplete
member.summary: Percent complete (value between 0 and 100)

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.Downloader.UseTestInstance
member.summary: When False use https://metadata.my.emsl.pnl.gov/fileinfo/files_for_keyvalue/omics.dms.dataset_id/12345 When True use https://metadatadev.my.emsl.pnl.gov/fileinfo/files_for_keyvalue/omics.dms.dataset_id/12345

member.name: M:MyEMSLReader.Downloader.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: M:MyEMSLReader.Downloader.DownloadFiles(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.Int64,MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo},System.String,MyEMSLReader.Downloader.DownloadLayout)
member.summary: Download queued files
member.param: MyEMSL Files to download; keys are MyEMSL File IDs and values are ArchivedFileInfo objects
Target directory path (ignored for files defined in destFilePathOverride)

member.name: T:MyEMSLReader.Reader
member.summary: This class contacts MyEMSL to find the files associated with the given dataset (by name or ID) Optionally filter on Instrument name to guarantee you are finding the desired files Optionally filter on Subdirectory name below the dataset directory to limit the search space Also supports searching by Data Package ID
member.remarks: Written by Matthew Monroe for PNNL in 2013.

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.Reader.DMSConnectionString
member.summary: DMS Connection string

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.Reader.IncludeAllRevisions
member.summary: When True, include all revisions of files that were imported to MyEMSL multiple times When False, only reports the newest version of a file
member.remarks: Default is False

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.Reader.LastSearchFileCountReturned
member.summary: File count returned by the most recent search

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.Reader.MaxFileCount
member.summary: Maximum number of files to return
member.remarks: Default is 5000

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.Reader.ReportMetadataURLs
member.summary: When true, raise a DebugEvent prior to contacting the metadata server

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.Reader.TraceMode
member.summary: When true, use Debug Events to show additional information

member.name: P:MyEMSLReader.Reader.UseTestInstance
member.summary: When False use https://my.emsl.pnl.gov/myemsl/elasticsearch/simple_items When True use https://test0.my.emsl.pnl.gov/myemsl/search/simple/index.shtml or if UseItemSearch=True use https://dev1.my.emsl.pnl.gov/myemsl/status/index.php/api/item_search

member.summary: Add a new file to the MyEMSL search results
member.param: MyEMSL search results
Dictionary where keys are DatasetID_RemoteFilePath and values are the transaction ID for that file
Remote file info, where key is relative file path (Windows style paths) and values are file info details (multiple entries if multiple versions)
Specific version of the remote file to add to searchResults
When true, keep duplicate versions of the same file (files with the same relative path, but different hash values)

member.name: M:MyEMSLReader.Reader.ConvertDatasetSubDirDictToSubDirListDict(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Convert a dictionary of dataset names and SubDir names to a dictionary of dataset names and SubDir lists (with one item per list for each dataset)
member.returns: Dictionary where Keys are dataset names, and Values are a list of subdirectory names to filter on for the given dataset

member.name: M:MyEMSLReader.Reader.ConvertDatasetSubDirAddToDictionary(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Collections.Generic.SortedSet{System.String}},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add a dataset name / subDir combo to the given tracking dictionary
member.param: Keys are dataset names, Values are a list of subdirectory names to filter on for the given dataset (exact match; cannot contain wildcards; empty list means do not filter by subdirectory name)
Dataset Name
Subdirectory name to filter on (exact match; cannot contain wildcards)

member.name: M:MyEMSLReader.Reader.FileHashExists(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{MyEMSLReader.ArchivedFileInfo},System.String)
member.summary: Return true if fileVersions has a file with the given hash
member.param: List of files in MyEMSL
SHA-1 hash to find
member.returns: True if a match is found, otherwise false

member.name: M:MyEMSLReader.Reader.FindFilesByDataset(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Collections.Generic.SortedSet{System.String}},System.Boolean,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}})
member.summary: Searches for files associated with one or more datasets
member.remarks: If the keys in datasetsAndSubDirLists start with DATASET_ID_TAG then they are Dataset IDs and not dataset names If the keys in datasetsAndSubDirLists start with DATA_PKG_ID_TAG then they are Data Package IDs and not dataset names
member.param: Keys are dataset names (or DATASET_ID_TAG and DatasetID or DATA_PKG_ID_TAG and DataPkgID), Values are a list of subdirectory names to filter on for the given dataset (exact match; cannot contain wildcards; empty list means do not filter by subdirectory name)
True to recursively find files
Ignored if datasetsAndSubDirLists has more than one entry

Search terms as key/value pairs Should support the following, but only actually supports "omics.dms.dataset_id" and omics.dms.dataset_name at present omics.dms.dataset_id omics.dms.dataset_name omics.dms.datapackage_id
If datasetsAndSubDirLists only has one entry, the dataset name will be ignored and the value in searchTerms will take precedence (it cannot be blank, but it could be "dummy" or "unknown" or "0", etc.)

member.name: M:MyEMSLReader.Reader.ResetStatus
member.summary: Clear the error message tracked by the base class

member.name: M:MyEMSLReader.Reader.RunItemSearchQuery(PRISMDatabaseUtils.IDBTools,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Call the Item Search service to find the matching items
member.remarks: A given remote file could have multiple hash values if multiple versions of the file have been uploaded
member.param: Key to search on
Key to search on
Value to match
Max time (in seconds) to wait for the item search query to finish
member.returns: Dictionary where keys are relative file paths (Windows style paths); values are file info details

member.name: M:MyEMSLReader.Reader.ValidateDatasetInfoDictionary(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Collections.Generic.SortedSet{System.String}})
member.summary: Examines the keys in datasetsAndSubDirLists to make sure that they are not a mix of datasets, dataset IDs, and data package IDs
member.param: Dictionary to examine
